title: Frank Serpico seeks seat on upstate New York town board
content:
Great entertainment, good food at Heritage Festival  
If you're looking for great music, free admission and entertainment, fabulous children's activities, and delicious ethnic food, you can't do better than to attend the 24th Annual Adams County Heritage Festival on Sunday, Sept. 20, from noon to 5 p.m. at the Gettysburg Area Recreation Park on Long Lane.
